About ACM Tula's

Empowering the next generation of computing professionals

Our Mission

To advance computing as a science and profession by fostering innovation, collaboration, and excellence among students at Tula's Institute.

Innovation Hub

We provide a platform for students to explore cutting-edge technologies, participate in hackathons, and develop groundbreaking solutions.

Learning Excellence

Through workshops, seminars, and hands-on projects, we ensure our members stay ahead in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.

Our Achievements

Celebrating excellence and innovation

Best ACM Chapter 2023

Recognized as the most active and innovative ACM student chapter in North India.

Hackathon Champions

Our team won first place in the National Inter-College Hackathon 2023.

Research Excellence

Published 15+ research papers in international conferences and journals.

Community Impact

Trained over 1000+ students in various programming and technology skills.
